name: Seeking revenge demo
description:
A hardcore 3D top-down shooter inspired by Hotline Miami. The game will have bright levels, nice graphics, a variety of weapons, both close and distant. Stylish music and short hand-drawn scenes that move the plot.

Destroy all enemies on the levels, slow down time to music and change weapons on the go.

But be careful, because there are many enemies, and the main character has only one life.
Dive into this adventure and take revenge on your enemies.

A page in incentive for those who liked the project:   https://store.steampowered.com/app/1392410/Seeking_revenge/
